00016 class vgImage
00017 {
00018         void*   allocated;
00019         unsigned char * image;
00020         bool    do_free;
00021         int     width;
00022         int     height;
00023         VGPixelFormat   pixfmt;
00024         agg::rendering_buffer *render;
00025 
00026         int GetPixelSize()
00027         {
00028             switch(pixfmt)
00029             {
00030 /*              case VG_Pixel_Bgr15:
00031                 case VG_Pixel_Bgr16:
00032                     return 2;
00033 */              case VG_Pixel_Rgba32:
00034                 case VG_Pixel_Argb32:
00035                 case VG_Pixel_Abgr32:
00036                 case VG_Pixel_Bgra32:
00037                     return 4;
00038             }
00039             return 4;
00040         }
00041         void Allocate(void *ptr);
00042     public:
00043         vgImage(int w, int h, VGPixelFormat pix, void* ptr=0);
00044         vgImage(const vgImage& old);
00045         vgImage* Clone() { return new vgImage (*this); }
00046         virtual ~vgImage();
00047 
00048         int GetWidth() const { return width; }
00049         int GetHeight() const { return height; }
00050         VGPixelFormat GetPixelFormat() const { return pixfmt; }
00051         agg::rendering_buffer* GetRender() const { return render; }
00052         unsigned char* GetImage() const { return image; }
00053 };
